alert.note: Alert for Conway (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Conway County through 515 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lanty, or 11 miles north of Morrilton, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morrilton... Bethlehem... Lanty... Hill Creek... Solgohachia... Cleveland... St. Vincent... Blick... Hattieville... Springfield... Middleton... Catholic Point... Plumerville... Birdtown... Overcup... Mt Olive in Conway County... Wonderview... Macedonia in Conway County... Center Ridge... Kenwood... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
